Relevant Information to be Included: Pbmcs of healthy donors were isolated and resuspended in RPMI-1640 medium
Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) stimulated with patient plasma
Inflammatory signatures identified in PBMCs stimulated with ASCVD plasma
Final Response: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from healthy donors, stimulated with plasma from atherosclerotic (ASCVD) patients, exhibiting inflammatory signatures.
